page.title: 14RECREATION 3
page.content: The Vale of Atholl Pipe band has a long history, but it is only recently that the band has achieved its current high standard. Since Ian Duncan became pipe-major six years ago, the band has risen from Grade 4 to promotion in 1981 to Grade 1. The junior band was formed in 1982, becoming Champions of Grade 4 in 1984. In 1985 the Novice Juvenile band was led by an ex-High School pupil, seventeen year old Sharon Walker. The band play at Highland Nights, the Highland Games and, of course, in competition. Recently the band has been invited to play at festivals in France, Germany and the U.S.A. The band is based in Pitlochry, but members live all over Britain, with one in Germany. At the moment there six High School pupils in the band.
